module.name: notifiers
module.title: Notifiers
module.description: Notification manager to manage sms and email in the system

data.name: registration_successful_email
data.title: Registration Successful
data.message:
You have registered successfully in our platform.
Your account will be activated after verification is complete.
Please contact the administrator if this takes longer than 48hours.

data.name: reset_password_email
data.title: Reset Password
data.message:
You have requested to reset your email.
Please use the [reset_password_link] to create reset it.

data.name: reset_password_successful_email
data.title: Reset Password Successful
data.message:
You have successfully reset your password.
Please use the new password to login back to your account.
